data.title: Welcome to Pinal Hirpara's blog...
data.meta_description: Posts about Jasdan written by PinalHirpara
data.text:
I and my family went at Kagwad Khodaldham in shilapujan Vidhi on 21st January 2012. Here, I want to share my memorable moments… Our journey had started from the Jasdan at 4:00 A.M. The distance between Jasdan and Kagwad is 71 KM so we reach Kagwad at 6:00 AM between that we had enjoyed lots of. But Shilapujan Vidhi time is 7 AM and we had a time of one hour so we took a breakfast and rest.

The amazing and unbelievable History of shilapujan Vidhi at Kagwad – Shree Khodaldham are…

-21,000 Shila Pujan in Khodaldham Kagwad

-21 Temples of God – Goddess in Khodaldham

-21,000+ Couple in Shila Pujan Vidhi at Khodaldham

-21,00,000 + People in Shila Pujan Event at Khodaldham

-Event Registered in “Guinness Book of World Records”

-210,00,00,000 + Donation in just 3 Hours for Development of Khodaldham in Kagwad

Guinness Book of World Record Team has registered this Khodaldham Event under “Guinness Book of World Records 2012”. Guinness Book of World Record Team has visited this historical event of Leuva Patel Samaj in Khodaldham Kagwad and presented certificate to Mr.Naresh Patel, Pramukh of Khodaldham Trust Kagwad.
